prompt: What is the purpose of this app?
completion: The purpose of this app is to provide an easy way for guests to navigate through the hospital, and also request certain services virtually.

prompt: How can I order office supplies?
completion: To order office supplies, navigate to the 'Office Supplies', page by selecting the option through the ',Service Request', dropdown. A landing page with 6 different items will appear, including highlighters, markers, pens, pencils, sticky notes, and notebooks. When you click on the desired office supply item, you will be brought to a page where you can select one of 3 choices corresponding to the selected office supply. You can then set the quantity and leave any notes regarding specific colors or sizes. After you add to cart, you can view your cart which will take you to the payment page. Enter your payment details to complete the transaction, then submit the request for office supplies. Please note that all fields on the submission page are required for a successful request submission. Is there anything else I can help you with?

prompt: That would be all, thank you!
